customer_name: Parker Exotic Pets L L C

citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The licensee does not have a written environment enhancement plan. A documented plan ensures that the birds are
provided with environment enhancement that promotes their psychological well-being. The licensee must develop,
document and follow a species-appropriate plan and have it approved by the attending veterinarian.
Correct by 6 March 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n
